p: A commercial power supply (PowerPac from Bio-Rad, CA, USA) was used to operate the electrophoresis unit in which the agarose gels were run to reveal the amplification products obtained by both the MaxyGene and the miniPCR thermocyclers. A Bio-Rad ChemiDoc XRS imaging system was used for end-point PCR detection. Alternatively, the miniPCR unit has its own blueGel electrophoresis unit ( Fig 1A and 1B), powered by 120 AC volts, and photo-documentation can be done using a smartphone camera.
